titleStmt.title: Madrigals to fiue voyces: newly published by Richard Carlton preist: batchelor in musique
titleStmt.author: Carlton, Richard, ca. 1558-1638?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Morley, dwelling in Little Saint Helens,

notesStmt.note: Five partbooks. At head of title, part 1: "Cantus"; part 2: "Altus"; part 3: "Tenor"; part 4: "Bassus"; part 5: "Quintus".
Signatures: A² B-E⁴ (-E4); A² B-E⁴ (-E4); A² B-E⁴ (-E4); A² B-E⁴ (-E4); A² B-E⁴ (-E4).
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
